author: crogers
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-1118 - write out form bean validations in order they're declared.

This is a patch from Andrew McCulloch. I've added the fix as well as the updated testRecorder validator tests. This commit does not include the compiler tests due to diffs on the order of the <msg> elements associated to a field rule. Thanks Andrew.

author: rpluem
msg: * Remove ourselves from the filter chain if we failed to init libz, as we
pass data down the filter chain uncompressed afterwards.

author: tellison
msg: New modifiers declared in classfile format update.  See Tables 4.5 and 4.7 in

author: rpluem
msg: * Fix potential memory leaks in deflate_out_filter if bailing out due to an
error (either in the lower filter chain or during a libz operation). We need
to call deflateEnd as it is very likely that this filter is never called
again to ensures that libz's internal structures get cleaned properly.
